UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user of the application. Stores basic profile information obtained from Google Sign-In, as well as business-specific details.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity. This should be the Firebase Auth UID.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

businessName.description: The name of the user's business.

businessLogoUrl.description: URL of the user's business logo.

CrewMember.title: CrewMember
CrewMember.description: Represents a crew member (subcontractor or partner) associated with a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CrewMember entity.

name.description: The name of the crew member.

dailyRate.description: The daily rate for a 'Helper' type crew member.

profitPercentage.description: The profit percentage for a 'Partner' type crew member.

email.description: The email address of the crew member.

phone.description: The contact phone number of the crew member.

avatarUrl.description: URL for the crew member's avatar image.

Job.title: Job
Job.description: Represents a job managed by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Job entity.

title.description: The title or name of the job.

description.description: Detailed description of the job requirements.

deadline.description: The deadline for completing the job.

location.description: The location or address of the job site.

GeneralExpense.title: GeneralExpense
GeneralExpense.description: Represents a general business expense not tied to a specific job.

category.description: The category of the expense (e.g., Gas, Insurance, Tools).

description.description: A detailed description of the expense.

amount.description: The monetary value of the expense.

date.description: The date the expense was incurred.

GeneralSettings.title: GeneralSettings
GeneralSettings.description: Stores global application settings, managed by the user.

dailyPayTarget.description: The target daily pay for profitability calculations.

idealMaterialCostPercentage.description: Ideal material cost as a percentage of the job's budget.

hourlyRate.description: Default hourly rate for 'Time' based adjustments.

reportRecipients.description: A list of email addresses to receive the weekly payroll report.

definition.description: A singleton document containing global application settings.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed with a user-centric data model. All primary data collections (jobs, crew, etc.) are subcollections of a specific user's document in the top-level 'users' collection. This approach ensures strong data ownership and simplifies security rules, as access control is primarily based on verifying that the request's authenticated user ID matches the {userId} in the document path. This prevents users from accessing each other's data and provides a scalable, secure foundation for the application. A new 'generalExpenses' subcollection is added to store business expenses not tied to a specific job. There is also a top-level 'settings' collection containing a single 'global' document for app-wide configurations.
